00020 CdcGeometryParameterMessenger::CdcGeometryParameterMessenger(MyVGeometryParameter* pGeometryParameter, G4String dirName)
00021 :SimpleGeometryParameterMessenger(pGeometryParameter, dirName)
00022 {
00023 
00024         m_GeometryParameter = dynamic_cast<CdcGeometryParameter*> (pGeometryParameter);
00025         if (!m_GeometryParameter){
00026                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometryParameterMessenger, Cannot convert pointer from MyVGeometryParameter* to CdcGeometryParameter!!!"<<std::endl;
00027     G4Exception("CdcGeometryParameterMessenger::CdcGeometryParameterMessenger()",
00028         "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00029         "Cannot convert pointer from MyVGeometryParameter* to CdcGeometryParameter!!!");
00030         }
00031 
00032         G4String fGeoDirName = get_GeoDirName();
00033         m_SubDirName = fGeoDirName+"CdcGeometry/";
00034 
00035         SubDir = new G4UIdirectory(m_SubDirName);
00036         SubDir->SetGuidance("geometry control");
00037 
00038 }
00039 
00040 CdcGeometryParameterMessenger::~CdcGeometryParameterMessenger()
00041 {
00042         delete SubDir;
00043 }

00045 void CdcGeometryParameterMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command,G4String newValue){
00046         MySetNewValue(command, newValue);

00051 int CdcGeometryParameterMessenger::MySetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command,G4String newValue)
00052 {
00053         int status = 0; //0 means found the value
00054         status = MyVGeometryParameterMessenger::MySetNewValue(command, newValue); //check Parent Class first
00055         if ( !status ) return status;
00056 
00057         return status;
00058 }
